attributes.action: We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to instruct the Department of Health to stop the Statutory Regulation of Practitioners of Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Traditional Chinese Medicine and Other Traditional Medicine Systems Practised in the UK but investigate the feasibility of establishing National Wellbeing Courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to instruct the Department of Health to stop the Statutory Regulation of Practitioners of Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Traditional Chinese Medicine and Other Traditional Medicine Systems Practised in the UK but investigate the feasibility of establishing National Wellbeing Courts. Said Courts to be duly vetted for the suitability by the Department of Health and answerable to the Department of Health. To have exclusive power in promoting the wellbeing of the public, run by the private enterprises, supported by the government tax incentives, such as zero VAT. So as to establish the National Wellbeing System, a parallel and commercial system to NHS.
